name: Dylan Corvidae
desc: An empathic non-binary software developer, queer circus performer, punk/metal musician, stellar parent & poly partner. My hobbies include: dance trapeze, hand-balancing, connecting to nature, playing and making music on guitar, piano, singing in choirs and screaming in bands.

name: Kamran Ali
desc: My name is Kam, a full-stack software developer that has proficiency in back-end Javascript node packages like express, and the front-end framework react/redux. I also have a strong background in Digital Design. I am very passionate about clean code and design, because I really want communication between the user and the developers clear.

name: Sam Jespersen
desc: Morty at heart, Jerry in practice.

name: Jose Ojeda
desc: Great Hair, Dad Jokes, Karaoke, Cardigan, Gator Mode.
